title: gaining small amounts of lp?
body: i just recently got to D5 and ever since for whatever reason i seem to be losing around 20 lp while only gaining 16-17, i know this can be due to low mmr or a lot of games lost in a row but it shouldnt be that since im winning more games than im losing. (other than one 4 game losing streak i had yesterday) i dont know if this is a bug of some sort or what but any help would be appreciated <3

replies.body:
It sounds like your current MMR has placed you the system thinks you should be, and that your LP loss/gain per match has been normalized. Additionally, strong winning streaks can cause your LP gain to be lower and lower with each win.

Our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) has the complete details on the ranking system. Let me know if you have any questions.
but shouldnt the system reward players more for going on large win streaks so they can climb faster? it doesnt make sense to that it would penalize us instead...
